page.title: 17Religion,Abermorddu District
page.content: All of the churches in the survey area have an ageing membership with most congregations having over 50's as the majority. Bethlehem, in Cefnybedd has a Sunday School with 25 youngsters attending. Most churches have memberships of less than fifty and all are faced with financial problems because the income from membership does not cover expenditure. Apart from contributing to the minister's wage, the biggest problems arise from heating and maintenance costs. Mr.John Meirion Evans, a deacon at Bethlehem church,Cefnybedd, reports that members do what is possible to maintain the church, but that some jobs have to be contracted out. His church,like others, holds regular fund-raising events to help meet costs.
